definition: deep and harsh sounding as if from shouting or illness or emotion, breed of heavy-coated Arctic sled dog
details:
adjective
- deep and harsh sounding as if from shouting or illness or emotion
= synonyms: gruff, hoarse
- muscular and heavily built
= synonyms: beefy, burly, strapping, buirdly
noun
- breed of heavy-coated Arctic sled dog
